changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE orders ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, user_id INTEGER NOT NULL, total_amount FLOAT NOT NULL, status_id INTEGER NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CONSTRAINT fk_order_user FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES application_user(id), CONSTRAINT fk_order_status FOREIGN KEY (status_id) REFERENCES status(id) );
